00058 /* This file contains a table of "standard" extensions */
00059 
00060 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_bcons, v3_nscert, v3_key_usage, v3_ext_ku;
00061 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_pkey_usage_period, v3_sxnet, v3_info, v3_sinfo;
00062 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_ns_ia5_list[], v3_alt[], v3_skey_id, v3_akey_id;
00063 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_crl_num, v3_crl_reason, v3_crl_invdate, v3_cpols, v3_crld;
00064 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_ocsp_nonce, v3_ocsp_accresp, v3_ocsp_acutoff;
00065 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_ocsp_crlid, v3_ocsp_nocheck, v3_ocsp_serviceloc;
00066 extern X509V3_EXT_METHOD v3_crl_hold;
00067 
00068 /* This table will be searched using OBJ_bsearch so it *must* kept in
00069  * order of the ext_nid values.
00070  */
00071 
00072 static X509V3_EXT_METHOD *standard_exts[] = {
00073 &v3_nscert,
00074 &v3_ns_ia5_list[0],
00075 &v3_ns_ia5_list[1],
00076 &v3_ns_ia5_list[2],
00077 &v3_ns_ia5_list[3],
00078 &v3_ns_ia5_list[4],
00079 &v3_ns_ia5_list[5],
00080 &v3_ns_ia5_list[6],
00081 &v3_skey_id,
00082 &v3_key_usage,
00083 &v3_pkey_usage_period,
00084 &v3_alt[0],
00085 &v3_alt[1],
00086 &v3_bcons,
00087 &v3_crl_num,
00088 &v3_cpols,
00089 &v3_akey_id,
00090 &v3_crld,
00091 &v3_ext_ku,
00092 &v3_crl_reason,
00093 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_OCSP
00094 &v3_crl_invdate,
00095 #endif
00096 &v3_sxnet,
00097 &v3_info,
00098 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_OCSP
00099 &v3_ocsp_nonce,

00104 &v3_ocsp_serviceloc,
00105 #endif
00106 &v3_sinfo,
00107 #ifndef OPENSSL_NO_OCSP
00108 &v3_crl_hold
00109 #endif
00110 };

00113 
00114 #define STANDARD_EXTENSION_COUNT (sizeof(standard_exts)/sizeof(X509V3_EXT_METHOD *))
